summary: In vanilla Skyrim, it says the claws do 15 points of base damage, but they actually do 12. This simple plugin fixes the Khajiit claws to actually deliver 15 points of damage.
descriptionHtml:
In vanilla Skyrim, it says the claws do 15 pts of base damage, but they actually do 12. This simple plugin fixes the Khajiit claws to actually deliver 15 points of damage.

May make the game a bit easier for Khajiit characters (at the beginning)...
author: Yetu
